subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Despite a 99-year World Series drought, the Cubs are one of the most iconic teams in sports and are expected to fetch more than the $660 million that was paid in 2002 for the Boston Red Sox.
snippet: Despite a 99-year World Series drought, the Cubs are one of the most iconic teams in sports and are expected to fetch more than the $660 million that was paid in 2002 for the Boston Red Sox.
